EmailTemplate.name: MMScriptManagerApprovalNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is approved by Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
The script {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is approved by manager {!User.Manager}. The Script is now ready for sending for client approval.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
